title: Why didnt i get a level 6 Mastery token?
body:
i got an S+ rank with my level 5 mastery champion and didnt get a token :/ why?
i played in ARAM does that make a difference?

replies.body: In addition to Zombiemaster's info, keep in mind that you'll also need to be level 5 at the start of the match.  It's not possible to reach level 5 and receive a token at the same.  More details are also provided in our[ champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
really I thought my friend said he got a token the same game he hit level 5 on a champ
Nope!  A cool animation banner appears, but it's telling you about the token system and not that you actually received one.  It confused me at first!
You are unable to earn mastery tokens when playing ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes. You are only able to earn them when playing normal or ranked Summoner's Rift.
